subtitle: Garlic and herb soft cheese makes an easy base for the sauce, and combined with the freshly cooked pasta provides a simply delicious texture and creamy taste.

ingredients.ingredient: soft cheese with garlic and herbs

method.text: Place the butter in a bowl and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 30 sec, stirring once. Mix in the sliced mushrooms and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 1-2 min, or until the mushrooms are just cooked. Set aside.

Place the tagliatelle in a large casserole dish or bowl. Pour boiling water over to cover. Stir well with the oil and salt. Cover and cook on 100% (FULL) power for 3 min. Stir. Reduce power to 30% (MEDIUM LOW) for 7-8 min until pasta is al dente when tasted.
Turn the garlic and herb cheese into a large dish. Heat gently on 30% (MEDIUM LOW) power for about 4 min. Stir in the cream gradually to make a smooth sauce.
Add a little of the pasta water to the sauce if necessary, to make a fairly thin consistency.
Season to taste. Stir in the mushrooms. Heat the sauce for a few minutes, on the medium low setting.
Drain the pasta thoroughly and run under boiling water to refresh. Drain well. Toss in the sauce to coat lightly. Spoon into a warmed serving dish. Serve immediately.

title: Tagliatelle with garlic and herb sauce - microwave
